attributes.action: We Need The Colin Duffy Truth!
attributes.additional_details:
We the public of Northern Ireland would like to know how Colin Duffy of the Real IRA got of in the British law courts got off with the cold blooded murder of 2 British soldiers on the EVE they were to be posted to Afghanistan. Where is the justice for the love ones of these 2 brave lads? Please sign up and get answers on how Duffy got off with this cold blooded terrorists act!!! 

http://www.bbc.co.uk/news/uk-northern-ireland-16637380
